front.title: Applicability of Maximally Redundant Trees to IEEE 802.1Qca Path Control and Reservation

abstract.t: IEEE 802.1Qca Path Control and Reservation (PCR) [IEEE8021Qca] uses the algorithm specified in [I-D.ietf-rtgwg-mrt-frr-algorithm] to compute Maximally Redundant Trees (MRTs) to be used for the protection of data traffic in bridged networks. This document discusses the applicability of the MRT algorithm to 802.1Qca.
